decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (7134-LP, 7134-01, 7134-02, 7134-03, 7134-04, 7134-05, 7134-06, Design and Access Statement prepared by Pelican Architecture & Design Ltd, Flood Risk Assessment prepared by Pelican Architecture & Design Ltd dated April 2016. Received on 20 April 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a two storey rear extension
